```{r setup, message=FALSE}
options(dplyr.summarize.inform = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)

paste_c <- function(t) { paste0(t, collapse = "") }

dat_to_mat <- function(dat) {
  dat |> 
    paste_c() |> 
    strsplit(split = "") |> 
    unlist() |> 
    matrix(nrow = length(dat), byrow = TRUE)
}
```
